Uses of Package
io.atomix.resource

  • Packages that use io.atomix.resource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs, including AtomixClient and AtomixReplica.
    io.atomix.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as DistributedAtomicValue and DistributedAtomicLong.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection, DistributedMembershipGroup, DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
    io.atomix.resource
    Provides classes and interfaces for creating and operating on Raft replicated state machines.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix 
    Class and Description
    Resource
    Fault-tolerant stateful distributed object.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix.atomic 
    Class and Description
    Consistency
    Resource consistency constraints.
    Resource
    Fault-tolerant stateful distributed object.
    ResourceInfo
    Annotation for defining information about a resource.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix.collections 
    Class and Description
    Consistency
    Resource consistency constraints.
    Resource
    Fault-tolerant stateful distributed object.
    ResourceInfo
